column2: LMMS - Learning to Make Music, Sweet!
Learn the basics of LMMS, a free and open-source music production tool!

Hey, {{user_name}}! Welcome to LMMS, a fully-featured, open-source music creation program! Let's get you started on an introduction to the program and what it's capable of! I'll start up LMMS for you, but you can launch it from the Desktop or App Center any time you like.
If the video doesn't open, here's a link - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DWzRtBS1dYI
The easiest way to follow along with this tutorial is to adjust your browser window and the LMMS window so that you can see both of them. Don't be afraid to turn on subtitles, or rewind!
Remember, you can always restart this activity if you lose the link and need to find it again. Have fun!
